item.title: Why Kevin O’Leary Is Against New Stimulus Checks From the Government
item.description: His comments follow Trump’s claim that Americans will receive $2,000 payments.

item.title: 365 Inspiring, Poignant and Just Plain Great Quotes for 2026
item.description: For the 11th year in a row, this is the first thing I publish: one inspiring quote a day for the entire year.

item.title: Want to Change Someone’s Behavior? Understand How the Brain Builds Habits, According to Neuroscience
item.description: Want to change your behavior? How about your consumers’ behavior? A new Georgetown study reveals how overlooked cues are the key.

item.title: AI May Be Making Us All Dumber. Here’s What to Do About It
item.description: If you’re leaning a little too hard on generative AI to help you get through the workday, you may struggle in the long term.

item.title: How Managers Need to Adapt to Lead Blended AI-Human Teams
item.description: As AI agents take on more duties, they may be treated more like employees. This will bring challenges.
